## lab issue list

List issues

### Synopsis

List issues

```
lab issue list [remote] [page] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for list
  -l, --label strings   filter issues by label
  -s, --state string    filter issues by state (opened/closed) (default "opened")
```
